original_title: Kobushi Factory & Tsubaki Factory Premium Live 2018 Haru "KOBO"
overview: Kobushi Factory & Tsubaki Factory Premium Live 2018 Haru "KOBO" (こぶしファクトリー&つばきファクトリー プレミアムライブ2018春 “KOBO”; Kobushi Factory & Tsubaki Factory Premium Live 2018 Spring "WORKSHOP") was Kobushi Factory and Tsubaki Factory's joint 2018 spring hall concert. It took place on May 3 and 5, 2018.  The DVD and Blu-ray of the May 3 concert were released on September 5, 2018. The Blu-ray includes a live photobooklet.
title: Kobushi Factory & Tsubaki Factory Premium Live 2018 Haru "KOBO"
